**Status**: active | **Priority**: critical | **Assignee**: QA Engineer
**Description**: Comprehensive testing of ai-trackdown CLI functionality and migration of existing trackdown tickets

**Status**: in_progress | **Priority**: critical | **Assignee**: QA Engineer
**Description**: Test all CLI commands for functionality and proper operation

**Status**: active | **Priority**: high | **Assignee**: QA Engineer
